name: Posthog Ingestion Alert Plugin
description: Trigger Webhooks when no events have been ingested to PostHog for a specified time period

config.markdown: Every minute plugin check for new events and alert when there have been zero within the chosen period

config.hint: This is the number of consecutive minutes with no events before the alert will trigger
config.name: No Ingestion Time Range (minutes)

config.hint: This is the webhook we will call when no new events have been detected in the set time range
config.name: WebHook Trigger Alert URL

config.hint: This is the webhook we will call when new events have been detected again
config.name: WebHook Resolve Alert URL

config.hint: Your Personal API Key is not the same as the Project API key
config.name: PostHog API Key
